brief: Represents a single row of data values, stored in columns, from a <b>Table<b>

methods.name: getString()
methods.desc: Get a String value from the specified column

methods.name: getInt()
methods.desc: Get an integer value from the specified column

methods.name: getFloat()
methods.desc: Get a float value from the specified column

methods.name: setString()
methods.desc: Store a String value in the specified column

methods.name: setInt()
methods.desc: Store an integer value in the specified column

methods.name: setFloat()
methods.desc: Store a float value in the specified column

description:
A TableRow object represents a single row of data values, stored in columns, from a Table.

Additional TableRow methods are documented in the Processing Data Javadoc.
name: TableRow
